item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description:
I haven't tried cheating yet. I'm still playing the game Grouchy Gnome's way.
For a moment there, I thought he might have been Gordon "Abashi" Wrinn--they both write welll--but decided that while Abashi was viewed as evil and unscrupulous, his name doesn't fit.
The worst part is, I'll probably have never even heard of him unless it was while reviewing the credits in the back of a game manual.
item.content:encoded:
I haven’t tried cheating yet. I’m still playing the game Grouchy Gnome’s way.

For a moment there, I thought he might have been Gordon “Abashi” Wrinn–they both write welll–but decided that while Abashi was viewed as evil and unscrupulous, his name doesn’t fit.

The worst part is, I’ll probably have never even heard of him unless it was while reviewing the credits in the back of a game manual.
